info.title: Giving Compass Insights
info.description:
## Overview

The Giving Compass Insights API provides access to nonprofit data, impact stories, financial information, and AI-powered search capabilities.

## Authentication

All endpoints require an API key passed via the `X-API-Key` header.

```
X-API-Key: your_api_key_here
```


## Core Capabilities

### Nonprofit Search
Search and filter nonprofits by location, revenue, expenses, cause areas, and Charity Navigator ratings.

### Impact Data
Access AI-extracted impact stories and metrics from nonprofit annual reports:
- **Stories**: Human transformation narratives with emotional hooks, quotes, and before/after states
- **Metrics**: Quantitative measures (people served, meals distributed, volunteers, etc.)

### Feed Data
Access and filter nonprofit posts (articles, events, videos, job postings) from organizations:
- **Content Types**: Filter by classification (articles, videos, events, podcasts, job postings, volunteer opportunities)
- **Location Filtering**: Filter posts by nonprofit's city, county, state, ZIP code, or geographic radius (lat/lng)
- **Cause Area Filtering**: Filter by NTEE codes to find posts from organizations working in specific cause areas

### AI Chat
Natural language search for nonprofits and content. Example queries:
- `Find articles about clean water`
- `Find nonprofits in Chicago with revenue over 100k`
- `Show nonprofits in TX that help the blind`
- `Nonprofits that are similar to JDRF`
- `Nonprofits that focus on SDG 5 with revenue between 1M and 5M`

get.description:
Get posts from all nonprofits for the global feed, sorted by newest first.
Organization names are guaranteed to be populated via SQL lookup.
Supports optional filtering by classification and search.

parameters.name: classification

schema.title: Post Classification
schema.description: Filter by post classification/content type (article, video, event, podcast, job_posting, volunteer_opportunity)

parameters.description: Filter by post classification/content type (article, video, event, podcast, job_posting, volunteer_opportunity)

schema.title: Search Query
schema.description: Search query for post titles and content

parameters.description: Search query for post titles and content

parameters.name: view

schema.title: View Mode
schema.description: View mode: 'latest' (all posts) or 'following' (favorited nonprofits only)

parameters.description: View mode: 'latest' (all posts) or 'following' (favorited nonprofits only)

ArticleContentsResponse.title: ArticleContentsResponse
ArticleContentsResponse.description: Variation of ArticleDetailsResponse that includes the article text

BetaChatIntentResponse.title: BetaChatIntentResponse
BetaChatIntentResponse.description: Response model for chat intents in the insights beta endpoint - Based off ChatIntentResponse

BetaNonprofitDetailsResponse.title: BetaNonprofitDetailsResponse
BetaNonprofitDetailsResponse.description: Response model for nonprofit details in the insights beta endpoint.

EmbeddedImpactMetric.title: EmbeddedImpactMetric
EmbeddedImpactMetric.description: Minimal metric representation for embedding in impact stories

GCFund.title: GCFund
GCFund.description: Holds the raw data returned from the GC Issue Fund API.

InsightsAssistantChatResponse.title: InsightsAssistantChatResponse
InsightsAssistantChatResponse.description: Holds the assistant's response to the user's message. Intended for API client responses.

InsightsImpactMetricResponse.title: InsightsImpactMetricResponse
InsightsImpactMetricResponse.description: Public API response for impact metrics

InsightsImpactStoryResponse.title: InsightsImpactStoryResponse
InsightsImpactStoryResponse.description: Public API response for impact stories (excludes internal fields like model_used)

InsightsNonprofitDetailsResponse.title: InsightsNonprofitDetailsResponse
InsightsNonprofitDetailsResponse.description:
DTO for returning nonprofit details in the public Insights API.
It contains a subset of the fields from NonprofitDetailsResponse.

KBArticleSource.title: KBArticleSource
KBArticleSource.description: Represents a source article from a knowledge base search

LLMFunctionCallResult.title: LLMFunctionCallResult
LLMFunctionCallResult.description: Holds the raw results of a GPT function call

NonprofitTaxReturnDto.title: NonprofitTaxReturnDto
NonprofitTaxReturnDto.description: DTO used to hold the details of a single tax return for a nonprofit.

APIKeyHeader.description: Add a header [X-API-Key] with the token
APIKeyHeader.name: X-API-Key

tags.name: Insights
tags.description: Search nonprofits, retrieve financial data, and access AI-powered chat for nonprofit discovery.

tags.name: Impact
tags.description: Access impact stories and metrics extracted from nonprofit annual reports. Stories are human transformation narratives with emotional hooks and quotes. Metrics are quantitative measures reported by nonprofits.

tags.name: Feed
tags.description: Access nonprofit posts and content feeds with advanced filtering by location, cause area, and content type. Filter posts by organization location (city, county, state, ZIP, lat/lng radius) and NTEE codes

tags.name: Beta
tags.description: Beta endpoints - may change without notice.
